statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, dest_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE payload_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND dest_ip = '10.0.0.1';
SELECT timestamp, payload_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT DISTINCT protocol FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY protocol DESC;
SELECT source_ip, dest_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'TCP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT dest_ip, protocol, payload_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' ORDER BY payload_size ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT protocol, MAX(payload_size) AS max_payload FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY protocol HAVING MAX(payload_size) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(payload_size), COUNT(*) FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'UDP';
SELECT * FROM network_logs WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, source_ip, data_size FROM network_logs WHERE destination_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_logs WHERE source_ip = '10.0.0.1' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT device_name, mac_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM network_logs WHERE data_size > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT log_id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND destination_ip = '192.168.1.2'
SELECT device_name, ip_address, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_type IN ('Router','Switch')
SELECT * FROM network_logs WHERE source_ip LIKE '192.168.%' AND destination_ip LIKE '10.0.%' ORDER BY log_id ASC
SELECT device_name, mac_address FROM network_devices WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.10'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs;
SELECT timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Switch' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM devices JOIN network_devices ON devices.device_id = network_devices.device_id WHERE network_id = 'f6529139-0a5c-48c6-b9c0-ffbe7b3c8ee5';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY source_ip HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM devices JOIN network_devices ON devices.device_id = network_devices.device_id WHERE network_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT protocol, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY protocol ORDER BY num_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.0.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT protocol, data_size FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) as num_requests FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_ip;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE ip_address='192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY source_ip ASC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, location FROM network_devices WHERE location IN ('New York', 'London', 'Singapore') ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_analysis WHERE analysis_result = 'malicious' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message FROM network_logs WHERE message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM network_devices WHERE device_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM network_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM network_users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM network_devices WHERE device_status = 'Active';
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM network_devices JOIN network_logs ON network_devices.device_id = network_logs.device_id GROUP BY device_name ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT device_name, MAX(traffic_bytes) AS max_traffic FROM network_devices JOIN network_traffic ON network_devices.device_id = network_traffic.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, alert_type FROM network_devices JOIN network_alerts ON network_devices.device_id = network_alerts.device_id WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
